h1 {

```{r setup, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library("knitr")
knitr::opts_knit$set(echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
source("monthlyreport_functions.R")
data <- read.csv('February2022TrackingData.csv')
data$Date.Used <- strptime(as.character(data$Date.Used), "%m/%d/%Y")
tracking.data <-reformat_googlesheet(data)
library('tidyr')
tracking.data <- separate_rows(tracking.data, source, sep=",")
tracking.data$source <- trimws(tracking.data$source)
tracking.data$date <- as.Date(tracking.data$date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
```

Repository for CM/N Programs Monthly Tracking reports.

# February 2022

```{r February 2022 Enrollment, eval=FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
rows <- c("Media Meteorologists","Market Penetration (%)", "Local Television Stations", "Spanish-language Meteorologists", "Journalists Receiving CMN")
values <- c(968, 92, 483, 55, 702)
enrollment <- as.data.frame(cbind(rows, values))
names(enrollment) <- c(" ", "Enrollment")
library("formattable")
formattable(enrollment)
```


### Hits by Program
```{r February 2022 Hits by Type and Program, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
tracking.data.February2022 <- tracking.data[which(tracking.data$month=="February" & tracking.data$year=="2022"),]

#expanded view
library("tidyr")
expanded.hits.draft.February2022 <- hitsbyprogram(tracking.data.February2022)
expanded.hits.February2022 <- expanded.hits.draft.February2022[,c("source", "Twitter",
                                  "online.article", "radio", "tv")]

#restrict data to CC, CM, CMN sources
expanded.hits.CMprograms.February2022 <- subset(expanded.hits.February2022, source=="CC"|source=="CM"|source=="CMN")
#aggregate hits according to nest program model
CMN.February2022 <- expanded.hits.CMprograms.February2022[3,2:5]
CM.February2022 <- CMN.February2022 + expanded.hits.CMprograms.February2022[2,2:5]
CC.February2022 <- CM.February2022 + expanded.hits.CMprograms.February2022[1,2:5]
aggregated.hits.CMprograms.February2022 <- rbind(CC.February2022, CM.February2022, CMN.February2022)
rownames(aggregated.hits.CMprograms.February2022) <- c("CC", "CM", "CMN")
#change column names
names(aggregated.hits.CMprograms.February2022) <- c("Twitter",
                          "Online Articles", "Radio", "TV")

library("formattable")
aggregated.hits.formatted.February2022 <- formattable(aggregated.hits.CMprograms.February2022,
                                       align=c("l", "c", "c", "c", "c"),
                                       list(''))

aggregated.hits.formatted.February2022
```

### Comparison with Last Year
```{r February 2022 Last Year Comparison, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
tracking.data.February2022 <- tracking.data[which(tracking.data$month=="February" & tracking.data$year=="2022"),]
tracking.data.February2021 <- tracking.data[which(tracking.data$month=="February" & tracking.data$year=="2021"),]
previousYear(tracking.data.February2022, tracking.data.February2021)
```

### Top Releases

Most-used releases this month on TV and Radio (including content released before this month).

```{r February 2022 Top Releases, warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
tracking.data.February2022.subsetted <- subset(tracking.data.February2022, source=="CC"|source=="CM"|source=="CMN")
rankedreleases.February2022 <- rankReleasesTVRadioOnly(tracking.data.February2022.subsetted)
top10releases.February2022 <-rankedreleases.February2022[c(1:10),]
names(top10releases.February2022) <- c("Release", "Radio", "TV", "Total")
top5releases.February2022 <-rankedreleases.February2022[c(1:5),]
names(top5releases.February2022) <- c("Release", "Radio", "TV", "Total")
library(DT)
datatable(top10releases.February2022, fillContainer=FALSE, options = list(scrollX="70px", scrollY="200px", pageLength = 5, dom = 'ftp'), rownames=FALSE)
```

### Hits by Region
```{r February 2022 Hits by Region, warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
#compute hits by regions
month.hitsbyregion.February2022 <- hitsbyregion(tracking.data.February2022.subsetted)
month.hitsbyregion.February2022
```
